title: rpgitem4如何右键绑定武器属性{1.7.10版本}
author: wadda8
txt_content:
/rpgitem [字符] power potionself rightclick 6000 600 2 speed 右键获得速度3效果30秒，冷却300秒
输入这个之后显示

replies.author: Coloured_glaze
replies.txt_content:
/rpgitem [物品] power potionself 冷却时间[整数值] 持续时间[整数值] 效果等级[整数值] 效果[字符]示例
/rpgitem [物品] power potionself 6000 600 3 speed
